title: Las Casas on native pop. - describe encomienda

content.question: In their colonization of the Americas, the Spanish used the encomienda system to

choices.label: organize and regulate Native American labor
improve trade relations with Native Americans
draft Native Americans into the Spanish military
limit intermarriage between Spaniards and Native Americans

content.answer: organize and regulate Native American labor
